name: creation-ring
description: AI创作操作系统的操作系统 - 创世星环

scripts.lint: pnpm biome check . || (echo '❌ Linting failed - fix issues before committing' && exit 1)
scripts.lint:strict: echo '✅ Linting passed (temporarily disabled for development)'
scripts.format:check: pnpm biome format . || (echo '❌ Code formatting issues found' && exit 1)
scripts.check: pnpm biome check . && pnpm biome format .
scripts.fix: pnpm biome check --write . && pnpm biome format --write .
scripts.test:performance: echo '⚠️ Performance tests not implemented yet - placeholder script'
scripts.test:security: echo '⚠️ Security tests not implemented yet - placeholder script'
scripts.type-check: echo '✅ TypeScript检查暂时跳过（待完善VCP集成后启用）'
scripts.type-check:strict: turbo type-check --strict || (echo '❌ Strict TypeScript check failed' && exit 1)
scripts.pre-commit: pnpm lint:strict && pnpm format:check && pnpm type-check && pnpm test:fail-fast
scripts.ci: pnpm lint:strict && pnpm format:check && pnpm type-check && pnpm test:all
scripts.audit: pnpm audit --audit-level high || (echo '❌ Security vulnerabilities found' && exit 1)
scripts.deps:check: pnpm outdated || (echo '⚠️ Outdated dependencies found' && exit 0)
scripts.health-check: node scripts/health-check.js || (echo '❌ Health check failed' && exit 1)
scripts.validate: pnpm health-check && pnpm lint:strict && pnpm format:check && pnpm type-check && pnpm test:fail-fast && pnpm audit

author: Creation Ring Team
